items.name: The Forgotten
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Unlock **The Forgotten**.

## Requirements
- Access to Boss Rush (needs Mom killed fast enough).
- Survive while being chased by stomps after starting the quest.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- On Floor 1, beat the boss in under 1 minute.
- Return to the starting room and bomb the centre to reveal the shovel piece.
- Pick up the quest item (you’ll be chased by stomps).
- Reach and complete Boss Rush while carrying it.
- Finish the sequence in the Dark Room to unlock **The Forgotten**.

## Tips
- Bring mobility and defensive items. The stomps do not negotiate.

items.name: The Lost
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Unlock **The Lost**.

## Requirement
- You need **Missing Poster**.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Get **Missing Poster**.
- Find a Sacrifice Room.
- Die on the spikes while holding Missing Poster.
- You unlock **The Lost**.

items.name: Hush
items.instructions: From a fresh run: beat Mom’s Heart/It Lives! within the time limit to open the Blue Womb portal; beat Hush at the end.

items.name: Delirium
items.instructions: From a fresh run: reach The Void via a portal after certain bosses (commonly after Hush / Mega Satan / Chest / Dark Room) and beat Delirium.

items.name: Mother
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **Mother** at the end of [[Corpse]].

## Unlock requirements (save file)
- Unlock the alt path (“A Secret Exit”) by defeating **Hush** 3 times. citeturn0search2turn0search15

## Route requirements (in-run)
- Access [[Downpour/Dross]] (locked door after boss, costs 1 key). citeturn0search2
- Obtain [[Knife Piece 1]] (white flame → mirror world → Treasure Room). citeturn0search16turn0search20
- Access [[Mines/Ashpit]] (alt-path entrance on the relevant boss room). citeturn0search19
- Obtain [[Knife Piece 2]] (triggers chase with Mother’s Shadow). citeturn0search6
- Access [[Mausoleum/Gehenna]] (costs 2 full heart containers). citeturn0search14
- Enter [[Corpse]] and beat **Mother**.

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Start a run and clear Chapter 1.
- Take the alt-path door into [[Downpour/Dross]].
- Reach Downpour II / Dross II and complete [[Knife Piece 1]].
- Continue the alt path into [[Mines/Ashpit]].
- Reach Mines II / Ashpit II and complete [[Knife Piece 2]].
- After Mines II, pay the health cost to enter [[Mausoleum/Gehenna]]. citeturn0search14
- Continue until you can enter [[Corpse]].
- Beat **Mother**.

## Common gotchas
- If you skip a Knife Piece, the route collapses and you can’t access Corpse.
- This route is longer and harsher than the normal path. That’s intended. 🙃

items.name: Dogma
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **Dogma** on the Beast route.

## Requirements
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Reach [[Home]].

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Get to Depths II and defeat Mom.
- Pick up **Dad’s Note** to begin [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Keep ascending until you arrive at [[Home]].
- Proceed to trigger the **Dogma** fight.

## After Dogma
- You are locked into the Beast route leading to [[The Beast]].

items.name: The Ultra Harbingers
items.instructions: From a fresh run: after Dogma, fight Ultra Famine/Pestilence/War/Death on the way to The Beast.

items.name: The Beast
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Beat **The Beast**.

## Requirements
- Beat [[Dogma]].
- Defeat the Ultra Harbingers (post-Dogma sequence).

## Step-by-step from a fresh run
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Reach [[Home]].
- Beat [[Dogma]].
- Defeat the Ultra Harbingers sequence.
- Beat **The Beast**.

items.name: Ultra Famine (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra Pestilence (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra War (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Ultra Death (The Beast)
items.instructions: From a fresh run: on the Beast route (post-Dogma), defeat this Ultra Harbinger during the ascent fight sequence.

items.name: Downpour/Dross
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 1.5 floors on the Repentance “alt path”.

## Unlock requirement (once per save file)
- Defeat **Hush** 3 times to unlock **A Secret Exit**. citeturn0search2turn0search15

## How to enter (from a fresh run)
- Finish **Basement I/II** (or Cellar/Burning Basement).
- After the boss, a **locked door** appears.
- Spend **1 key** to open it.
- Enter **Downpour I/II** (or Dross I/II). citeturn0search2

## Why you care
- Needed for [[Knife Piece 1]] on Downpour II / Dross II.
- Required route toward [[Mother]].

items.name: Mines/Ashpit
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 2.5 floors on the Repentance alt path.

## Unlock requirement
- Same as alt path in general: defeat **Hush** 3 times (A Secret Exit). citeturn0search2turn0search15

## How to enter (from a fresh run)
- After **Basement II** / the early chapters, later boss rooms can spawn the alt-path entrance.
- The entrance to **Mines/Ashpit** is a **blocked door** that typically requires **2 bombs** to open (it appears on the appropriate chapter boss rooms once the alt path is unlocked). citeturn0search19

## Why you care
- [[Knife Piece 2]] is obtained on Mines II / Ashpit II.
- Required route toward [[Mother]].

items.name: Mausoleum/Gehenna
items.instructions:
## What it is
- Alternate Chapter 3.5 floors on the alt path.

## How to enter (from a fresh run)
- Beat **Mines II / Ashpit II**.
- A door to **Mausoleum / Gehenna** appears.
- It costs **2 full heart containers** to open (it “pays” with health). citeturn0search14

## Why you care
- This is the gateway chapter to reach [[Corpse]] and fight [[Mother]].

items.name: Knife Piece 1
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Obtain **Knife Piece 1** on **Downpour II / Dross II**.

## Requirements
- Alt path unlocked (Defeat **Hush** 3 times). citeturn0search2turn0search15
- Reach **Downpour II / Dross II**.

## Step-by-step (assume you know nothing)
- Enter [[Downpour/Dross]] and reach **Downpour II / Dross II**.
- Find a room with a **white flame**.
- Touch the flame to become a “Lost-like” form (fragile: no normal heart health). citeturn0search20turn0search10
- Find the **mirror** room and enter it while in that form to access the **Mirrored World**. citeturn0search10turn0search16
- In the Mirrored World, go to the **Treasure Room** and pick up **Knife Piece 1**. citeturn0search16turn0search5
- Leave the Mirrored World and continue the run.

## Gotchas
- On XL floors, only one mirrored Treasure Room contains the piece. citeturn0search10
- If the mirror breaks (some bombs/items), you can lose access. citeturn0search10

items.name: Knife Piece 2
items.instructions:
## Goal
- Obtain **Knife Piece 2** on **Mines II / Ashpit II**.

## Requirements
- Alt path unlocked (Defeat **Hush** 3 times). citeturn0search2turn0search15
- Reach [[Mines/Ashpit]] and get to **Mines II / Ashpit II**.

## Step-by-step (assume you know nothing)
- Progress through [[Mines/Ashpit]] until you are on **Mines II / Ashpit II**.
- Find the sequence that leads to the **Knife Piece 2** pickup.
- When you pick it up, it triggers a **chase sequence** with **Mother’s Shadow**.
- Survive the chase and reach the end of the corridor to secure **Knife Piece 2**. citeturn0search6

## Gotchas
- The chase is dangerous. Treat it like a “don’t stop moving, don’t corner yourself” segment.
- Once you have both pieces, the Knife is complete and is used for the [[Mother]] route.

items.name: Corpse
items.instructions:
## What it is
- The final area of the alt path leading to **Mother**.

## How to reach (from a fresh run)
- Unlock and take the alt path: [[Downpour/Dross]] → [[Mines/Ashpit]] → [[Mausoleum/Gehenna]].
- Obtain both: [[Knife Piece 1]] + [[Knife Piece 2]] (Knife completed). citeturn0search1
- Use the Knife on the special door at the end of the alt path to enter **Corpse**.
- Beat [[Mother]] at the end of Corpse.

## Why you care
- This is the only normal route to the **Mother** final boss.

items.name: Ascent & Dad's Note
items.instructions:
## How to start
- Reach Depths II.
- Defeat Mom.
- Pick up **Dad's Note**.

## What happens
- The run reverses and you ascend back up through earlier floors.

## End goal
- Reach [[Home]] for [[Dogma]] and [[The Beast]].

items.name: Home
items.instructions:
## How to reach
- Start [[Ascent & Dad's Note]].
- Keep climbing until you reach **Home**.

## What to do at Home
- Open Mom’s bedroom.
- (Optional) Open the closet as a character to unlock its tainted version.

## End goal
- Trigger [[Dogma]] and the Beast route.
